events.message: We have successfully received the application from the candidate for the software engineer role. The resume indicates strong experience in backend development and cloud infrastructure.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on the candidateâ€™s expertise in software engineering and related technical skills they listed.
A recruiter has been assigned to this candidate to guide them through the hiring process and coordinate upcoming interviews and assessments.
The initial screening call went well, with the candidate demonstrating solid knowledge of software development principles and enthusiasm for the position.
The candidate responded promptly confirming availability for the next steps and expressed continued interest in the engineering role and the company culture.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate with the senior engineering team, aiming to further assess coding skills, problem solving, and system design.
